feedback.name: Rajesh
feedback.feedback: Hello everyone! I purchased an incredible herbal bathing powder from Narumugai Herbal Products. After just 1 week, I noticed a remarkable transformation in my skin. It leaves my skin radiant and glowing. Thanks for the wonderful products.

feedback.name: Abisheika
feedback.feedback: Nice and awesome homemade product, makes skin soft and smooth. 100% natural, no chemicals, no side effects.

feedback.name: Surenika
feedback.feedback: Been using your product the results are evident. Pimples and tan are completely removed. Gives me a soft and glowing skin.

feedback.name: Vaiishalini
feedback.feedback: Your product was such an amazing one which made my skin clear and soft. Gone through all the products and satisfied with yours. Pimple marks are totally reduced and happy to see my face.

feedback.name: Sobiya
feedback.feedback: Good product. My pimples are reduced and there are no new pimples. Feels fresh and skin looks bright. Smells refreshing.

feedback.name: Blessy Queen Mary
feedback.feedback: Nice aroma and fragrance. It gives me soft, smooth and skin texture.
